search.query: index=tennis Comment=Completed (Winner="$player1$" OR Winner="$player2$") AND (Loser="$player1$" OR Loser="$player2$") | fields *

| search (Winner="$player1$" OR Loser="$player1$") | eval games_won_1set=if(Winner="$player1$",W1,L1), games_won_2set=if(Winner="$player1$",W2,L2), games_won_3set=if(Winner="$player1$",W3,L3), games_won_4set=if(Winner="$player1$",W4,L4), games_won_5set=if(Winner="$player1$",W5,L5), sets_won=if(Winner="$player1$",Wsets,Lsets) | stats count as Matches, sum(eval(Winner="$player1$")) as matches_won, sum(eval(Loser="$player1$")) as matches_lost, avg(games_won_1set), avg(games_won_2set), avg(games_won_3set), avg(games_won_4set), avg(games_won_5set) by Court, Surface, "Best of"

| search (Winner="$player2$" OR Loser="$player2$") | eval games_won_1set=if(Winner="$player2$",W1,L1), games_won_2set=if(Winner="$player2$",W2,L2), games_won_3set=if(Winner="$player2$",W3,L3), games_won_4set=if(Winner="$player2$",W4,L4), games_won_5set=if(Winner="$player2$",W5,L5), sets_won=if(Winner="$player2$",Wsets,Lsets) | stats count as Matches, sum(eval(Winner="$player2$")) as matches_won, sum(eval(Loser="$player2$")) as matches_lost, avg(games_won_1set), avg(games_won_2set), avg(games_won_3set), avg(games_won_4set), avg(games_won_5set) by Court, Surface, "Best of"

| search (Winner="$player1$" OR Loser="$player1$") | search Court=$court$ Surface=$surface$ | fields Date, Tournament, Court, Surface, "Best of", Winner, Loser, Wsets, Lsets, W1, L1, W2, L2, W3, L3, W4, L4, W5, L5 | fields - _raw, _time

| search (Winner="$player1$" OR Loser="$player1$") | eval games_won_1set=if(Winner="$player1$",W1,L1), games_won_2set=if(Winner="$player1$",W2,L2), games_won_3set=if(Winner="$player1$",W3,L3), games_won_4set=if(Winner="$player1$",W4,L4), games_won_5set=if(Winner="$player1$",W5,L5), sets_won=if(Winner="$player1$",Wsets,Lsets) | stats count as Matches, sum(eval(Winner="$player1$")) as matches_won, sum(eval(Loser="$player1$")) as matches_lost, avg(games_won_1set), avg(games_won_2set), avg(games_won_3set), avg(games_won_4set), avg(games_won_5set) by Court, Surface, "Best of" | search Court=$court$ Surface=$surface$

| search (Winner="$player2$" OR Loser="$player2$") | eval games_won_1set=if(Winner="$player2$",W1,L1), games_won_2set=if(Winner="$player2$",W2,L2), games_won_3set=if(Winner="$player2$",W3,L3), games_won_4set=if(Winner="$player2$",W4,L4), games_won_5set=if(Winner="$player2$",W5,L5), sets_won=if(Winner="$player2$",Wsets,Lsets) | stats count as Matches, sum(eval(Winner="$player2$")) as matches_won, sum(eval(Loser="$player2$")) as matches_lost, avg(games_won_1set), avg(games_won_2set), avg(games_won_3set), avg(games_won_4set), avg(games_won_5set) by Court, Surface, "Best of" | search Court=$court$ Surface=$surface$
